title: zasad@
author: zasad@
content: This little guide will help you get the maximum amount of tokens. If you decide to sell your tokens, then you can do this before sending them to the exchange.Tokens are unlocked linearly, but if you wait for the automatic process, it takes longer.Developer, choose ExtrinsicsYou need to set vesting and claim parameters and then sign the transactionYou will pay a small fee, but all your tokens that have a linear unlock for the current time will be available to you.This method is suitable for weight tokens in the polkadot ecosystem, where there is vesting.__https://t.me/dionrich/2149CryptoDi(C)
